entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:49 PM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:49 PM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 15. POP 30%
